Cargar paquetes
```{r}
library(data.table)
```

Importar bases de datos
```{r}
gree.products <- read.csv("C:\\Users\\Ingrid\\Desktop\\Complejidad económica\\LAB 30\\green products.csv")
all.products <- read.csv("C:\\Users\\Ingrid\\Desktop\\Complejidad económica\\LAB 30\\COMPLETE_YEARS_PRODUCTS.csv")
```

Leer elementos como tabla
```{r}
gree.products <- as.data.table(gree.products)
all.products <- as.data.table(all.products)
```

Hacer el merge
```{r}
merge.allproducts = merge(all.products, gree.products, by= "product_code")

merge.full = merge(all.products, gree.products, by= "product_code", all.x = TRUE)
```

Exportar archivo
```{r}
write.csv(merge.full, file = "merge.full.csv")
```
